name: Sofa Chop
description:
In Sofa Chop you play as Unpaid Intern 403 under the management of your boss Mr. Berk O' Witz

Help customers by slicing non-matching sofas into bits.

Press space progress dialogs

Hold Left mouse button whilst dragging to slice sofas.

Don't make Mr.Berk Angry!
